metadata.feature_description: Save all community settings together as a single transaction with validation and error handling.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Modify multiple settings and save all at once

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings page loads with Miscellaneous Community Settings section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings page loaded successfully showing Influence goals table and Miscellaneous Community Settings section with checkboxes and dropdowns

steps.action: View the settings section with all available options
steps.expected: All settings visible: Content Moderation, Comment Moderation, Enable WYSIWYG, Page Size, Comments Page Size, Profanity Filtering, Group Home Page
steps.actual: All settings sections visible with current values - Content Moderation (Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events), Comment Moderation (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki), Enable WYSIWYG, Page Size dropdown, Comments Page Size dropdown, Profanity Filtering dropdown, Group Home Page dropdown, and Save button

steps.action: Toggle Ideas checkbox in Content Moderation, toggle Blogs checkbox in Comment Moderation, change Page Size to 10 items, change Profanity Filtering to Filter Content
steps.expected: Multiple settings should be modifiable before saving
steps.actual: Successfully modified: Ideas checkbox toggled to checked, Blogs checkbox toggled to checked, Page Size changed to 10 items, Profanity Filtering changed to Filter Content

steps.action: Click Save button to save all changes at once
steps.expected: All settings saved in single transaction with success notification
steps.actual: Save completed successfully with 'Item successfully saved.' notification displayed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify success notification on successful save

steps.expected: Success notification should appear after save
steps.actual: Green success notification appeared with message 'Item successfully saved.' The notification displayed with a success icon and auto-dismissed after a few seconds

steps.action: Click Save button without making any changes to settings
steps.expected: Save should complete successfully even with no changes
steps.actual: Save completed successfully with 'Item successfully saved.' notification displayed. The system accepts save operations even when no values have been modified

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify settings persistence after page refresh

steps.action: Change Comments Page Size to 15 items and Group Home Page to Discussions
steps.actual: Successfully changed Comments Page Size to 15 items and Group Home Page to Discussions
Save completed with 'Item successfully saved.' notification

steps.action: Refresh the page and navigate back to Community Settings
steps.expected: Settings should persist after page refresh
steps.actual: After page refresh and navigating back to Community Settings, the saved values persisted: Comments Page Size shows '15 items' (selected) and Group Home Page shows 'Discussions' (selected). The batch save successfully persisted multiple settings.

observations: The batch save feature successfully saves multiple settings in a single transaction as confirmed by code review of CmxSettingsController.SaveCmxSettings method
The save operation uses optimized caching - only changed values are persisted and cache is cleared once at the end for performance
Success notifications display correctly with green icon and 'Item successfully saved.' message
Settings that can be batch saved include: Content Moderation flags, Comment Moderation flags, Editor Choice settings, Page Size, Comments Page Size, Profanity Filter, and Group Home Page
The save button is always available (not disabled based on changes) allowing users to save at any time
